author: auth0

BATCH_SIZE.description: The amount of logs to batch before sending. A single cron execution will send multiple batches. The maximum value is 100.

START_FROM.description: Checkpoint ID of log to start from.

SLACK_INCOMING_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Slack Incoming Webhook URL used to report statistics and possible failures

SLACK_SEND_SUCCESS.description: This setting will enable verbose notifications to Slack which are useful for troubleshooting

REMOVE_USER_ID_PREFIX.description: This setting will remove the `auth0|` prefix of the user id before sending it to Segment

title: Auth0 Logs to Segment (Predictice fork)
name: auth0-logs-to-segment-predictice
description: This extension will take all of your Auth0 logs and export them to Segment
